    // Beispiel: Mo-Fr, 08:00 und 16:00 Uhr
    private readonly Dictionary<DayOfWeek, List> _schedule = new()

        { DayOfWeek.Friday,    new() { new TimeSpan(8,0,0), new TimeSpan(16,0,0) } }
    };

    protected override async Task ExecuteAsync(CancellationToken stoppingToken)

using SendGrid;
using SendGrid.Helpers.Mail;

internal class EmailSender(IOptions<AuthMessageSenderOptions> optionsAccessor,

{

    public AuthMessageSenderOptions Options { get; } = optionsAccessor.Value;

    public Task SendConfirmationLinkAsync(ApplicationUser user, string email, string confirmationLink) => SendEmailAsync(email,
            "Confirm your email",

            "Reset your password",
